name: iracing-setup-diff
author: Tomoaki Hayasaka
description: Yet Another iRacing Setup Diff/Comparison Tool

scripts.build-debug: ( cd .. && echo "make: Entering directory '$(pwd)'" && elm make src/Main.elm --output electron/elm.js ) && cp -p elm.js elm.min.js
scripts.build-dev: ( cd .. && echo "make: Entering directory '$(pwd)'" && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output electron/elm.js ) && cp -p elm.js elm.min.js
scripts.build: ( cd .. && echo "make: Entering directory '$(pwd)'" && elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output electron/elm.js ) && npm run uglify
